name: Encore Productions
overview: Encore Productions, Inc. operates as a production and audio/visual equipment rental company. The company enables organizations to develop, produce, and stage their presentations and events, including sales meetings, user groups, trade shows, product launches, press conferences, awards shows, executive retreats, seminars, educational forums, and road shows. Its presentation and event services include creative services, such as message assessment and strategy, theme creation and development, scripting, story boarding, show design and direction, video conception and creation, music design, art direction, 2D and 3D graphics, animations, speaker support, set design and construction, and talent and speaker booking; show management; scenic design and staging; and entertainment booking services. The company also provides video and graphics production services. In addition, it offers audio/visual rentals and staging services, such as audio, video, and lighting gear; video projection/seamless switching; sound, stage, and lighting design; video wall rental and programming; communication gear; temporary meeting room installation; and labor and labor management. Encore Productions, Inc. was founded in 1988 and is based in Las Vegas, Nevada. As of September 2, 2010, Encore Productions, Inc. operates as a subsidiary of The Freeman Companies.
